B

build() - Method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
Finally builds an unmodifiable Config.
Builder(Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
Creates a modifialbe deep copy of the given Map.
Builder(Properties) - Constructor for class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
Creates a modifialbe "deep" copy of the given Properties, following the dot separated paths;
Builder() - Constructor for class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
 
buildUpon(Config) - Static method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
Uses the Config to copy data from.

C

com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper - package com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper
Cooper is a set of utilities, usually useful during an application’s init phase.
Config - Class in com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper
Config is a smart and fast wrapper of a Map<String, Object> and provides easy access to all (hierarchical) entries via paths like "path.to.property.name" in a safe way: if there is no value an empty Optional is returned to avoid NullPointerExceptions.
Config(Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config
Creates an unmodifialbe deep copy of the given Map.
Config.Builder - Class in com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper
Since Config is unmodifiable this is a convenient way to prepare the underlying modifiable Map.

G

get(String) - Method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
Similar to Config.get(String).
get(String) - Method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config
Access any available property by path.
getPaths() - Method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config
Just to inspect what’s available.

O

OptionsResolver - Class in com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper
The motivation is to have a simple tool to resolve an application’s parameters from the environment, the JVM args and at last the programm args:

P

put(String, T) - Method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
The hard way to set/replace a property, or delete if value is null.
putIfEmpty(String, T) - Method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
Ideal for setting a property default value if it is not yet exist some reason.
putOf(String, Optional<T>) - Method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.Config.Builder
The prefered way to set a property value.

R

resolve(String, Character, String...) - Static method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.OptionsResolver
Resolves a named value from the environment or commend line.
resolveFlag(String, Character, String...) - Static method in class com.github.dittmarsteiner.cooper.OptionsResolver
Resolves a flag from the environment or commend line.
